ValidationRule.description: Tier 1 ROOFPRO Accounts cannot sign up for HomeAdvisor. This validation rule blocks partner users from creating a HomeAdvisor subscription record when trying so save after clicking the 'Setup HomeAdvisor' Account Action.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your Tier (Tier 1 - ROOFPRO Preferred) does not allow you to sign up for HomeAdvisor. This is reserved for Tier 2 (ROOFPRO Select) and Tier 3 (ROOFPRO Craftsman Premier) Contractors.
